name: Fortezza Onlus
goal:
Ente di diritto privato italiano, apolitica e senza fine di lucro operante nel settore dell'assistenza sociale, socio-sanitaria, sanitaria, beneficenza, istruzione, formazione, tutela dei diritti civili, promozione della cultura e dell'arte a favore di soggetti svantaggiati per ragioni economiche, sociali, fisiche, sanitarie ed in particolare verso gli immigrati non abbienti e che versano in gravi condizioni di disagio sociale.
---
Institution of Italian private law, non-political and non-profit organization working in the field of social assistance, social care, health, charity, education, training, protection of civil rights, promotion of culture and art in favor of disadvantaged people economic reasons, social, physical, health and in particular to immigrants and have-nots who are in conditions of serious social unrest.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, External Relations, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
